headline: The Ultimate Chili
name: The Ultimate Chili
description: Red wine in chili adds intense flavor! This chili is big on taste with beef, beans, veggies, and spices, and the wine really kicks it up a notch.
recipeIngredient: 3 (15 ounce) cans dark red kidney beans

recipeInstructions.text: Cook and stir ground beef in a large skillet over medium-high heat until evenly browned, 5 to 7 minutes. Drain off grease, then season with salt and pepper.

Transfer beef to a slow cooker. Add kidney beans, tomatoes, celery, bell pepper, and vinegar. Season with chili powder, cumin, parsley, basil, and Worcestershire sauce. Stir to distribute ingredients evenly.
Cook on Low for 8 hours or High for 6 hours. Pour in wine during the last 2 hours.
